items.title: At least six die in crush at Ghana military recruitment event
items.description: Thousands had turned up to El-Wak stadium, in the capital Accra, with hopes of being enlisted.

items.title: All five members of K-pop group NewJeans set to return to label after legal battle
items.description: NewJeans has been locked in a legal battle with Ador, accusing the agencyof mistreatment and manipulation, which it denies.

items.title: Wife and son of Gabon's ousted leader given 20-year jail terms in two-day corruption trial
items.description: They were not in court and have described the charges against them as “a legal farce”.

items.title: Colombian military bombs suspected rebel camp, killing 19
items.description: The air strike comes after the US accused the Colombian president of allowing the drugs trade to expand.

items.title: Italy probes claims that tourists paid to shoot at civilians in Bosnian war
items.description: Italians and others are alleged to have paid large sums to fire at Bosnians risking their lives in besieged Sarajevo.
